page.title: 10 Kinver Rock Houses.
page.content: Sandstone 280,000,000 years old.The wind has blown the sandstone causing it to lie at different angles.Sandstone crumbled away leaving big openings in the rock which people used to live in until 1950s.One of the rock houses is called Holy Austin Rock, believed to be named after a monk.Nancy Price,the famous Kinver actress, describes in her book'Into an Hour Glass'how she used to take her washing up to her sisters there.People cultiv- ataed their gardens on the slopes of which there are still signs.1935 a jug of tea cost 2/6,2/-deposit on the jug. In recent years vandals have been chipping away at the rocks & have caused serious rock falls.Now cordoned off in danger of being lost.
